dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: How to use options to play small caps, Apple earnings
News Content: Small caps (^RUT) have rallied about 18% over the last year. But it has been anything but a smooth ride. To hedge against the downside, BayCrest managing director David Boole recommends buying puts on the iShares Russell 2000 ETF (IWM).

Learn the details of Boole's small-cap call and how he thinks investors may want to play Apple's (AAPL) earnings in the video above.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

This post was written by Stephanie Mikulich. Related Videos

06:07

Despite Trump uncertainty, there are bullish signs for the market

Yahoo Finance Video • 47 minutes ago 06:26

P&G Sales Jump Without Price Hikes

Bloomberg • 1 hour ago 03:05

Bloomberg • 1 hour ago 17:01

CoinDesk • 1 hour ago

View Comments



Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
  "reasoning": "The news article focuses on small-cap stocks and using options to hedge against their volatility, mentioning Apple (AAPL) only briefly within the context of how investors might approach its earnings.  The article does not provide any specific information about Apple's expected performance or any factors that would directly influence its stock price. Therefore, the news is largely irrelevant to predicting AAPL's price movement.  The probabilities are based on the assumption that the news has minimal impact on Apple's stock price, reflecting the general market uncertainty rather than any specific information about Apple itself.",
  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "How to use options to play small caps, Apple earnings",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.45,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.45
}
```
